name: Bit Rush
description:
A Visual Novel + 8-bit Platformer crossover mobile game about a high school student who plans to stop an evil corporation by buying out 51% of it's stock.

Developed in the 2019-2020 year of the UMBC Game developer's club

Contributers:

  • Brandon Ellis (Project Lead, Lead Programmer)
  • Felice Henriquez (Lead Character Artist)
  • Alana Reyes (Programmer)
  • Cade Christianson (Lead Story-writer)
  • Andrew Beck (Tester, Story-writer)
  • Faith Madeoy Gault (Sprite Artist)
  • Arason Anbazhagan (8-bit music)
  • Craig Stone (Programmer)
  • Alex Holstein (Early Character Designs)
  • Angela Liu (Early Character Designs)
